status_effect.description: If specified, only this status effect will have its amplifier modified upon being received.
status_effect.markdownDescription: If specified, only this status effect will have its amplifier modified upon being received.

status_effects.description: If specified, only these status effect(s) will have its amplifier modified upon being received.
status_effects.markdownDescription: If specified, only these status effect(s) will have its amplifier modified upon being received.

modifier.description: If specified, this modifier will be applied to the amplifier of the specified status effect(s).
modifier.markdownDescription: If specified, this modifier will be applied to the amplifier of the specified status effect(s).

modifiers.description: If specified, these modifiers will be applied to the amplifier of the specified status effect(s).
modifiers.markdownDescription: If specified, these modifiers will be applied to the amplifier of the specified status effect(s).

type.description:
[Power Type](../power_types.md)

Modifies the amplifier of the specified status effect upon receiving the specified status effect.

Type ID: `origins:modify_status_effect_amplifier`
type.markdownDescription:
[Power Type](../power_types.md)

Modifies the amplifier of the specified status effect upon receiving the specified status effect.

Type ID: `origins:modify_status_effect_amplifier`
